name: Trash Wizard
description:
When magic has become everyday life there are still the good old normal jobs to do like cleaning up the trash! Take on little demons who have invaded you trash route and teach them a lesson! But be careful, if they make to much of a mess you'll lose!

Controls

 Melee Attack - Right mouse button

 Ranged Attack - Left mouse button

Aim - Mouse

Move - WASD keys

Contributions

Programming - Daniel "ADustyOldMuffin" Hix

Programming - "Tarkonner"

Art - Otto "OTTOMAN"

Art - "Helbetico"

Music - Mathias "MathiasBS"

Design - "Zenakiiwii"
